June 4, 1906 D Shrewsbury Contest
Shrewsbury Contest 10 Other Shrewsbury Contest shrewsbury-contest

Spohr's Works
Shrewsbury, Shropshire Prizes - 1st £30, 2nd £10, 3rd £6, 4th £4. March contest 1st Crosfields, 2nd Wingates, 3rd Royal Oakley. 4 bands competed.
Feb. 28, 2012, 2:41 p.m. Sept. 13, 2018, 12:16 p.m.
1 Wingates Band William Rimmer
2 Perfection Soap Works G. Bedforth
2 Royal Oakeley Band J. E. Fidler
